title: Cyprus Hotel Site Snapshot Input
description: Collect raw HTML and mobile screenshots (home page) for a single hotel website.

hotelId.title: Hotel ID
hotelId.description: MongoDB hotels._id as string. Used to join snapshot with your database.

seedUrls.title: Seed URLs
seedUrls.description: Optional list of starting URLs. If empty, https://<domain>/ will be used.

maxPages.title: Max pages
maxPages.description: Maximum number of pages to crawl (including the home page).

maxDepth.title: Max depth
maxDepth.description: Maximum crawl depth starting from the seed URLs. Home page depth is 0.

pageTimeoutSecs.title: Page timeout (seconds)
pageTimeoutSecs.description: Navigation + waiting timeout for a single page.

waitAfterLoadMillis.title: Wait after load (ms)
waitAfterLoadMillis.description: Extra wait after page load to allow scripts to finish rendering.

blockResources.title: Block resource types
blockResources.description: Optional list of resource types to block to speed up crawling (image/media/font).

takeSecondScreenshot.title: Take second screenshot
takeSecondScreenshot.description: If enabled, the actor will take a second screenshot after scrolling down.

secondScreenshotScrollY.title: Second screenshot scroll Y
secondScreenshotScrollY.description: Scroll position (in pixels) before taking the second screenshot.

proxyGroups.title: Proxy groups
proxyGroups.description: Optional Apify proxy groups (e.g. RESIDENTIAL). Used only when useProxy=true.
